import React from 'react' import { useState } from 'react'; import { useEffect } from 'react'; import './Dashboard.css' import axios from 'axios'; import Card from 'react-bootstrap/Card'; import Col from 'react-bootstrap/Col' const Home = () => { const [data, setData] = useState([]); const [result, setResult] = useState([]); useEffect (()=>{ axios .all([ axios.get('https://disease.sh/v3/covid-19/all'), axios.get('https://disease.sh/v3/covid-19/countries'), ]) .then( res => { setData(res[0].data); setResult(res[1].data); }) .catch(err=>{ console.log(err); }) },[]) const date = new Date(parseInt(data.updated)); const lastupdated = date.toString(); const countries = result.map((data, i)=>{ return ( div ) }) return ( <>

COVID-19 Tracker

As of July 2020, the coronavirus disease (COVID-19) had been confirmed in around 210 countries and territories around the world. There had been over 15.66 million cases and around 628,184 deaths.

{data.active}

Active Cases
Last Updated {lastupdated}

{data.deaths}

Fatalities
Last Updated {lastupdated}

{data.recovered}

Recovered
Last Updated {lastupdated}
{countries}
) } export default Home
